titleStmt.title: The compleat angler or, The contemplative man's recreation. Being a discourse of fish and fishing, not unworthy the perusal of most anglers.
titleStmt.author: Walton, Izaak, 1593-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Maxey for Rich. Marriot, in S. Dunstans Church-yard Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iz. Wa. [i.e. Izaak Walton].
The words "The compleat .. recreation." on title are engraved in a decorative cartouche.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
